text: Naye kabaka n’agamba Alawuna nti, “Nedda, nzija kulisasulira24:24 Dawudi n’agula akasozi konna aka Moliya. Mu kifo ekyo mwe yazimba Yeekaalu ya Mukama, okumpi ennyo n’ekibuga kya Dawudi ku luuyi lw’obukiikakkono (1By 22:1; 2By 3:1).. Sijja kuwaayo ssaddaaka ez’ebiweebwayo ebyokebwa eri Mukama Katonda wange, nga sisasulidde muwendo.”
